overview: Micha has over seventeen years of experience in software development and project management. Running R&D teams from idea stage to launched and delivered products. Prior to Moblica, Micha was Co-Founder and CTO of C.O.Sense developing a multi-participant Interactive TV entertainment platform. Micha was also an R&D manager at B.V.R. Systems, leading flight simulation and battlefield training projects for European and Asian customers. Micha is a graduate of Mamram.
